Text:
thnkzzz buddy...
waitin for this...u rock!!!
the download was fast, but, I can't see anything!!! the video is blank on latest vlc!!! what gives?

VLC 1.1.13 "Luggage".

I also have movie player with all the codecs installed and even that reports unknown H264 codec.

Strange, eh?

I ended up downloading the bigger version of this movie.

Thnks anyway.
Theres absolutely nothing strange at all, Just update your VLC to latest version 2.0.5, that should resolve the problem.

sometimes when VLC gives me trouble... i use KMPlayer ... which works like charm.. but peronally i prefer VLC "_"

thanks for this rip VYTO
it worked perfectly with kmplayer.. i almost never use vlc now
